message.en:
Put your middle or index fingers on the E and I keys of your keyboard
(or button LEFT and RIGHT if you're on a tablet or mobile device).
In this part of the study, words representing categories will appear one-by-one in the middle of the screen.

The labels at the top will tell you which words go with each key.

When the item belongs to a category on the left, press the E key; when the item belongs to a category on the right, press the I key (or touch LEFT and RIGHT buttons on a mobile device). Each word has an easy correct classification and belongs to only one category. If you make an error, an X will appear – fix the error by hitting the other key.

A few rules to remember:

Keep your fingers on the E and I keys to enable rapid response.
The test gives no results if you go slow. Please try to go as fast as possible
Expect to make a few mistakes because of going fast. That's OK.
For best results, avoid distractions and stay focused.
message.sl:
Put your middle or index fingers on the E and I keys of your keyboard
(or button LEFT and RIGHT if you're on a tablet or mobile device).
In this part of the study, words representing categories will appear one-by-one in the middle of the screen.

The labels at the top will tell you which words go with each key.

When the item belongs to a category on the left, press the E key; when the item belongs to a category on the right, press the I key (or touch LEFT and RIGHT buttons on a mobile device). Each word has an easy correct classification and belongs to only one category. If you make an error, an X will appear – fix the error by hitting the other key.

A few rules to remember:

Keep your fingers on the E and I keys to enable rapid response.
The test gives no results if you go slow. Please try to go as fast as possible
Expect to make a few mistakes because of going fast. That's OK.
For best results, avoid distractions and stay focused.
message.fr:
Placez vos majeurs ou vos index sur les touches E et I de votre clavier
(ou les boutons GAUCHE et DROITE si vous utilisez votre tablette ou téléphone portable).
Dans cette partie de l'étude, des mots représentant des catégories vont apparaître un par un sur le milieu de l'écran.

Les labels en haut vous diront quels mots vont avec chaque touche.

Quand l'élément appartient à une catégorie sur la gauche, appuyez sur la touche E; quand l'élément appartient à une catégorie sur la droite, appuyez sur la touche I (ou pressez les boutons GAUCHE et DROITE sur une tablette ou un téléphone portable). Chaque mot a une classification facile à trouver et appartient à une seule catégorie. Si vous faites une erreur, un X apparaîtra – corrigez l'erreur en appuyant sur l'autre touche.

Quelques règles à se rappeler :

Gardez vos doigts sur les touches E et I pour répondre rapidement.
Le test ne donne pas de résultat si vous allez lentement. Essayez s'il vous plaît d'aller le plus vite possible.
Attendez vous à faire quelques erreurs en allant vite. C'est tout à fait normal.
Pour la qualité de l'étude, éviter les distractions et restez concentré(e)
message.ko:
양손의 중지 혹은 검지 손가락을 각각 E와 I 키에 (만약 모바일 기계를 통해 이번 과제에 참가하시는 경우에는 버튼 LEFT 와 RIGHT에) 놓아주세요.
이번 과제에서는 특정 주제에 맞는 단어들을 분류하셔야 합니다. 단어들을 분류할 두 주제는 화면 상단에 위치해 있으며, 그 주제들과 관련된 단어들은 화면 가운데에 하나씩 나타날 것입니다.

화면 상단에는 단어들을 분류할 두 범주를 보여드립니다.

화면에 등장하는 단어가 왼쪽범주에 속하면, E 를 눌러주시고,오른쪽 범주에 속하면 I 를 눌러주세요(혹은 LEFT와 RIGHT 버튼을 터치해주세요). 단어를 분류하는 것은 전혀 어렵지 않으며, 각 단어들은 오직 한 범주에만 속합니다. 잘못 분류하셨을 경우에는 X표시가 나타납니다. X표시가 나타날 때, 선택하신 것의 반대 범주에 해당하는 키를 눌러 정정해주세요.

규칙은 다음과 같습니다:

양손의 손가락을 E 와 I 위에 올려 두시면 빠르게 응답 할 수 있습니다.
만약 느리게 응답할 경우 결과가 나오지 않으니 가능한 빠른 속도로 반응해주세요.
빠른 반응으로 인한 실수가 있을 수 있지만, 큰 문제가 되지 않습니다.
최상의 결과를 얻기 위해, 주의를 집중해주세요.

message.en:
Put your middle or index fingers on the E and I keys of your keyboard.
Words representing the categories at the top will appear one-by-one in the middle of the screen.
When the item belongs to a category on the left, press the E key (or the LEFT button on a mobile device).
When the item belongs to a category on the right, press the I key (or the RIGHT button on a mobile device).
Words belong to only one category. If you make an error, an X will appear - fix the error by hitting the other key.
This is a timed sorting task. GO AS FAST AS YOU CAN while making as few mistakes as possible.
Going too slow or making too many errors will result in an uninterpretable score.
message.sl:
Put your middle or index fingers on the E and I keys of your keyboard.
Words representing the categories at the top will appear one-by-one in the middle of the screen.
When the item belongs to a category on the left, press the E key (or the LEFT button on a mobile device).
When the item belongs to a category on the right, press the I key (or the RIGHT button on a mobile device).
Words belong to only one category. If you make an error, an X will appear - fix the error by hitting the other key.
This is a timed sorting task. GO AS FAST AS YOU CAN while making as few mistakes as possible.
Going too slow or making too many errors will result in an uninterpretable score.
message.fr:
Placez vos majeurs et vos index sur les touches E et I de votre clavier.
Les mots représentant les catégories sur le haut vont apparaître un par un au milieu de l'écran.
Quand l'élément appartient à une catégorie sur la gauche, appuyez sur la touche E (ou le bouton GAUCHE sur une tablette ou un téléphone portable).
Quand l'élément appartient à une catégorie sur la droite, appuyez sur la touche I (ou le bouton DROITE sur une tablette ou un téléphone portable).
Les mots appartiennent à une seule catégorie. Si vous faites une erreur, un X apparaîtra – corrigez l'erreur en appuyant sur l'autre touche.


Le test ne donne pas de résultat si vous allez lentement. Essayez s'il vous plaît d'aller le plus vite possible
message.ko:
양손의 검지 손가락을 각각 E와 I 키 위에 올려주세요.
각 범주에 속하는 단어들이 하나씩 화면 중간에 나타날 것입니다.
화면에 등장하는 단어가 왼쪽 범주에 속하면, E (모바일 기계로 참여할 경우, LEFT)를 눌러주시고 ,오른쪽 범주에 속하면 I (모바일 기계로 참여할 경우, RIGHT)를 눌러주세요.
각 단어들은 오직 한 범주에만 속하며, 잘못 분류하셨을 경우에는 X표시가 나타납니다. X표시가 나타날 때, 선택하셨던 것의 반대 범주에 해당하는 키를 눌러 정정해주세요.

message.en:
See above, the categories have changed. The words for sorting have changed as well.
The rules, however, are the same.
When the words belongs to a category on the left, press the E key.
When the item belongs to a category on the right, press the I key. Words belong to only one category.
GO AS FAST AS YOU CAN.
message.sl:
See above, the categories have changed. The words for sorting have changed as well.
The rules, however, are the same.
When the words belongs to a category on the left, press the E key.
When the item belongs to a category on the right, press the I key. Words belong to only one category.
GO AS FAST AS YOU CAN.
message.fr:
Comme vous pouvez le constater ci-dessus, les catégories ont changé. Les mots pour le classement ont également changé.
Les règles, cependant, restent les mêmes.
Quand les mots appartiennent à une catégorie sur la gauche, appuyez sur la touche E.
Quand l'élément appartient à une catégorie sur la droite, appuyez sur la touche I. Les mots appartiennent à une seule catégorie.
ALLEZ AUSSI VITE QUE POSSIBLE.
message.ko:
위의 화면과 같이 범주의 위치가 바뀌었습니다. 각 범주에 분류할 단어들 또한 바뀌었습니다.
분류하시는 방법은 앞서 하신 과제의 방법과 동일합니다.
화면에 등장하는 단어가 왼쪽 범주에 속하면, E 를 눌러주시고 오른쪽 범주에 속하면 I 를 눌러주세요. 각 단어들은 오직 한 범주에만 속합니다.
가능한 빨리 반응해 주세요.

cta.en: Press any button (or touch anywhere) to begin.
cta.sl: Press any button (or touch anywhere) to begin.
cta.fr: Appuyez sur n'importe quel bouton (ou touche) pour commencer.
